ingredients.ingredient: 1 teaspoon white sugar, or more to taste
1 tablespoon shredded coconut, or to taste

cookingTips: Stir coconut milk well to combine separated cream before measuring
Use combined liquid of coconut milk and water to achieve proper rice-to-liquid ratio
Fluff rice with fork after resting to avoid clumping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the proper liquid-to-rice ratio when using coconut milk and explain how to prevent starch from making rice gummy.
